alert.note: Alert for Grant (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:41PM CDT until April 27 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LONOKE...NORTH CENTRAL GRANT...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near East End, or 7 miles southeast of Bryant, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shannon Hills... England... Wrightsville... Keo... East End... Ironton... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Sweet Home... Hensley... Sardis... Higgins... Bredlow Corner... Willow Beach... Toltec... Vimy Ridge... Woodson... Parkers-Iron Springs... Terry Lock and Dam... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
